article_title: Billy Graham's Final Message Delivered to 95th Birthday Gathering (Video)
article_text:

og.description: Billy Graham celebrated his 95th birthday Thursday night in the company of hundreds of friends and family members delivering what has been described as his final message via a 30-minute video titled "The Cross - Billy Graham's Message To America."
